person.persName: George Colvin Lightfoot (Pendleton County, merchant., hotelkeeper & tavern keeper)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant and tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda O. Holton Lightfoot in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on June 10, 1830. Father of George N. Lightfoot, Laura Lightfoot, Frank Lightfoot, and C. D. Lightfoot. Postmaster in Falmouth from December 31, 1841. Hotelkeeper in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant and tavern keeper in Pendleton County in 1860.
